title: Wereworld - Curtis Jobling - MOBI
description:
I was surprised to find that these books were not available on TPB and that I had to search the entire internet for them. To help others avoid this frustration, here are the first 5 books. 

WEREWORLD by Curtis Jobling

1 - Rise of the Wolf
2 - Rage of Lions
3 - Shadow of the Hawk
4 - Nest of Serpents
5 - Storm of Sharks

Format provided is MOBI. Enjoy.
